result.execSummary:
The defendant Charles D Lewis was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500) [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Charles D Lewis
parties.address: 515 W Moreland Blvd, C/O Waukesha County Jail, Waukesha, WI 53188

supervisions.notes: Costs to be paid at the rate of $25.00 per month commencing 12/01/2016 and each month thereafter or penalty of 8 days jail, consecutive for non-payment.

Sentence credit of 125 days were granted. Time Served.

16CM1000 was dismissed and read in.
**Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Charles D Lewis in court, in custody, with attorney Nicholas Martinez.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern Jack Pitzo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant enters a plea of guilty to count #2.  Court accepts the plea and finds the defendant guilty of count #2.  State is in compliance of victim/witness notification.  State makes recommendations as to sentencing.  Attorney Martinez presents statements to the Court.  Defendant makes statements to the Court.  

The Court Orders the Following to count #2:

125 Days Jail- (credit 125 days)  TIME SERVED

COSTS:  $243.00   

DNA Surcharge: $200.00 

DNA Sample ordered and to be provided immediately if in custody or within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department. 

Total costs/fine/forfeiture:  to be paid at the rate of $25.00 per month commencing 12/1/16.  Failure to pay;  the Court orders the defendant to serve 8 days in Huber
